settings.comment: Maximum number of meshes to use for animating needle movement of held compasses.
Milliseconds between updates to compasses rendered in another player's hand. Only updates on game ticks.
Milliseconds between updates to compasses which are placed as blocks or displayed inside another. Only affects compasses with moving targets and only updates on game ticks.
